name: Chicken Noodle Soup
steps:
Dice chicken, carrots, celery, and onion.
Heat broth in a large pot and bring to a boil.
Add chicken and cook for 10 minutes.
Add vegetables and garlic, simmer for 10 minutes.
Add noodles and cook for 8-10 minutes until tender.
Season with salt and pepper.
Garnish with fresh parsley before serving.
